definition: A place or institution where official information, announcements, or messages are conveyed, typically representing a government or an embassy. It is commonly used to refer to a physical location or building where diplomatic or official communications take place.

examples.german: Die Botschaft des Films war sehr emotional.
examples.english: The message of the movie was very emotional.

examples.german: Die Botschaft des Buches war inspirierend.
examples.english: The message of the book was inspiring.

examples.german: Die Botschaft des Gemäldes war schwer zu interpretieren.
examples.english: The message of the painting was difficult to interpret.

examples.german: Die Botschaft des Songs war politisch motiviert.
examples.english: The message of the song was politically motivated.
